original_summary: #Person2# tells #Person1# how to get to the cross bakery building.

transformed_conversations.personal_summary:
Here's a summary of your interactions with Sam over the past couple weeks regarding the cross bakery building. It started about 10 days ago on April 7th when you first asked Sam for directions to the bakery in person. He helpfully explained that you needed to turn around, go 3 blocks to Broadway, turn left, and go 2 more blocks, with the building being between the post office and supermarket. 

Later that same day, you messaged Sam to thank him again and let him know you found the building. A few days after that on April 10th, you reached out to Sam again, this time asking if he had any recommendations for what to get at the bakery. He enthusiastically suggested trying their signature cinnamon rolls and mentioned they have great coffee too.

Then just last Friday, April 14th, you messaged Sam one more time to share that you loved the cinnamon rolls he recommended and had been going to the bakery regularly for coffee and pastries all week. You mentioned possibly meeting up there sometime. Sam seemed open to the idea and said to let him know.

So in summary, over these past 10 days you've gone from getting lost trying to find this bakery to becoming a regular there, all thanks to the initial directions and recommendations Sam provided. Seems like a nice little local spot you've discovered!

messages.content: You: Hey Sam, thanks again for the directions earlier to the cross bakery building. Really appreciate you pointing me in the right direction - I was totally lost!
Sam: No problem at all, happy I could help! Did you manage to find it ok?
You: Yep, found it with no issues thanks to your clear directions. Excited to check it out!
You: Morning Sam, I had a quick question for you - do you have any recommendations for what to get at the cross bakery? Wanted to see if there's anything I should definitely try
Sam: Oh for sure, you've gotta try their cinnamon rolls, those are their signature item and they're amazing. Their coffee is really good too. Let me know what you think!
You: Amazing, I'll definitely get a cinnamon roll and coffee then. Thanks for the tips!
You: Sam! I just wanted to let you know I finally tried the cinnamon rolls you recommended at the bakery and wow, you weren't kidding. They really are incredible.
You: I've been going there for coffee and pastries pretty much every day this week now haha. Might be a bit obsessed. We should grab coffee there together sometime!
Sam: Right?? I'm so glad you liked them! It's such a great little spot. And I'm always down for coffee, just let me know when you want to meet up and I'll be there.
You: Sounds great, I'll take a look at my schedule and send over some times. Talk to you soon!
